title: Kanna Nee Thoongadaa Lyrics Baahubali 2
stanzas:
<div>
Kanna Nee Thoongadaa Lyrics Baahubali 2

muraithaana mugunthaa
sarithaanaa sanandhaa (3)

poovayar meedhu
kan Â yeivadhu muraiyaa
paavaiyin nenju thinam
theikindrar piraiyaa
podhume nee konjam
thuyil kolladaa

kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa

unthiral ezhilmalai
sumandhathu podhume
kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa

un idhazhinil kuzhal
isaithathu podhume
kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa

kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa

gopiyar kulikkaiyile
udaigal thirudi kalaithaai,
oaivedu maayavane

paanaiyil vennaiyinai
thinam thirudi ilaithaai
thoongidu thooyavane

podhum kannaa
nee seiyum thiruttu
vaanam engum
soozhnthathu iruttu.
maarbil saainthu
kanmoodadaa

kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa(2)

soalaiyin naduvinile
nulaindhen alaindhaen
thulaindhaen
naan unadharuginile

kaanagam naduvinile
mayangi kirangi kidanthaen
naan unadhazhaginilae

maadhavaa
yaadhavaa

leelai seidhu ennai
nee kavilka.
kaalai modhi
unnaiyum kavilka.
kaayam ennaavil kondaayada

kannaa nee thoongadaa
en kannaa nee thoongadaa(2)

muraithaana mugunthaa
sarithaanaa sanandhaa (2)

madhanaa madhusudhanaa
manoharaa manmohana(2)

kannaaaa
muraithaana mugunthaa
sarithaanaa sanandhaa
kannaaaa
kannaaaa

krishnaa ra ra ramana
kannaa nee thoongadaa
